travelers.notes: Business partners (travel agents) and BFFs. Both in 50s, experienced travelers, foodies, good physical health. First time to Portugal. Scouting trip to learn destination for future client sales.

preferences.vibe: Pack it full — culture, food, scenic villages, beaches, shopping. Dual purpose: personal adventure + business reconnaissance.
preferences.budget: Cost-conscious with selective splurges for right experiences
preferences.mobility: No restrictions. Kim prefers shorter car rides (no long drives).
preferences.transportation: Train-based itinerary. No rental car. Day trips from two bases.
mustHave: Shopping - fashion for Susie, unique/off-beaten-path for Kim
See key tourist spots to understand for future clients
avoid: Rental car if practical to skip

routing.reasoning: Kim has Delta status, earns miles. JFK has premium lounges.

itinerary.summary: Two bases (Lisbon 4 nights, Porto 4 nights) with day trips by train. No rental car.

days.title: Arrive Lisbon
days.dining: Easy dinner near hotel - try Martinho da Arcada (Lisbon's oldest café, since 1782)

days.title: Lisbon Exploration + Food Tour
days.dining: Food tour covers lunch. Evening: Taberna da Rua das Flores or Cervejaria Ramiro (seafood)

days.title: Sintra Day Trip
days.dining: Lunch in Sintra village. Dinner back in Lisbon: Prado (farm-to-table, vegan options)

days.title: Cascais Beach Day
days.dining: Seafood lunch in Cascais. Dinner: Fado show at Tasca do Chico or Sr. Fado

days.title: Train to Porto
days.dining: Dinner with river views: Bacalhau or Adega São Nicolau

days.title: Porto Exploration + Food Tour
days.dining: Food tour covers tastings. Dinner: Tapabento at São Bento Station

days.title: Douro Valley Scenic Train
days.dining: Lunch in Pinhão riverside. Dinner: Francesinha at Café Santiago or Lado B

days.title: Porto Free Day
days.dining: Special farewell dinner: Raiz or Ora Viva

kims_gem.name: Taberna Albricoque
kims_gem.description: Hidden Algarve-inspired tavern by chef Bertílio Gomes. Cockle pastries, oysters, razor clams in garlic. Feels like stepping into old Portugal.
kims_gem.whySpecial: Locals-only vibe, exceptional seafood petiscos, right near train station. Perfect pre-Porto departure lunch spot.
kims_gem.url: Not well-known online - that's the point
